name: Gulu: A Tail's Journey
description:
Who wouldn’t want to spend some time going on quests as a lovely villager cat wearing traditional clothes? Who wouldn’t like to experience all the ups and downs that a cute little cat can have to survive? You can experience it all by playing as Gulu. Gulu is a beautiful ginger cat on a story rich adventure. You can get a chance to play as a humanoid cat to explore this epic story from Gulu’s perspective.
As a little cat in the wild, life can be tough. Gulu, a little cat living in the wild, did not like to work or live with others in the village. He would run around, play and annoy other villagers. When he was hungry, he would steal other’s food, but his life took a turn and he had to prove to everyone that he could live as an honest and friendly cat.
In this 3d-platformer game featuring a cat named Gulu on his journey in the stylized wild nature and villages, you will Solve puzzles, find the hidden keys to each level, evade traps, collect the bottles of milk, cross the mountains and rivers, and reach the end of this epic story!
